Interface ClientInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Client, FileClient, GroupClient

    public interface ClientInterface
    Interface that contains methods relating to all forms of clients to be used by the group-based file sharing application. This interface came from the splitting of the FileClientInterface and the GroupClientInterface.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean connect(java.lang.String server, int port)
      Connect to the specified group server.
      void disconnect()
      Close down the connection to the server.
      boolean isConnected()
      Determines whether or not the client is connected to the server.

    • Method Detail

      • connect

        boolean connect(java.lang.String server,
              int port)
        Connect to the specified group server. No other methods should work until the client is connected to a group server.
        Parameters:
        server - The IP address or hostname of the server
        port - The port that the server is listening on
        Returns:
        true if the connection succeeds, false otherwise

      • isConnected

        boolean isConnected()
        Determines whether or not the client is connected to the server.
        Returns:
        Returns whether or not the client is connected. Returns false if there is no valid connection between the client and the server.

      • disconnect

        void disconnect()
        Close down the connection to the server.
